events.message: I received my new blender yesterday but it has a large crack on the container and will not blend properly.
The customer issue has been identified as a Product Defect based on the reported crack and malfunction.
A support agent has been assigned to handle the product defect report and follow up with the customer.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the cracked blender. I’m here to help you get this sorted out as soon as possible.
Could you please send us a photo of the damaged blender and let us know if you have already tried using it despite the crack?
I attached photos of the cracked blender container. I did try using it, but it leaks and doesn’t blend at all.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement blender shipped immediately at no extra cost or a full refund if you prefer.
I would like to receive the replacement blender as soon as possible. Thank you for the quick response and solution.
Your replacement order has been processed and will be shipped today. You will receive tracking information shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your replacement blender and that it’s working correctly now.
Yes, the new blender arrived today and it works perfectly. Thank you for the excellent support.
Glad to hear everything is resolved. Closing this case now, and please contact us if you need any further assistance.
